title: We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again.
body: I have tried everything, reinstalling, force patching, looking for other discussions with similar issues and nothing has worked for me. This hasn't happened to me before until this update. It also says "We have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends. Now we will try to patch it up to the latest version." When I open the client. But it never downloads any patches. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Same exact issue here.  All we can do is pray that Riot support will notice us.  I ran the hextech repair tool which accomplished absolutely nothing.  HELP!
try sending a ticket to riot support, that's what I'm doing
This shouldn't be an issue, you should still be able to play games after restarting the client.
I've restarted it many times and it says the same thing every time
anyone who is still having problems getting the update to work go into your hard drive and delete the riot games folder then reinstall league of legends fresh, it worked for me!

what about im switch my drive C: to D: ?
This is working ??


PLissss HELP .......
{{sticker:cass-cry}}

Essentially what's happening is the patcher is behind a patch, but for some reason doesn't ever try to actually update. You should be able to get that patch going by running a **Force Repatch** with the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), but if that doesn't do the trick let's try doing a **repair through the client options**.

I tried that too but it didn't seem to do anything, what I just did was completely delete any league of legends related files off my computer and reinstalled it fresh. it's still downloading so I'm not sure if it worked but it seems to be updating now.

So progress I guess

Hey, sometimes we just need to do a little troubleshooting before we get to the root of the issue. If that reinstall doesn't work, it might be due to some leftover game files hanging around. Let me know if that reinstall doesn't help and we can dig a little more!
Hi I'm having the same problem and tried reinstalling after trying to use the Hextech Repair Tool and neither worked for me.
I had this problem and i fixed it by hiding the folder which league was in.... as i made this folder hidden before
